author: Ramy Inocencio
title: China hikes official Wuhan coronavirus death toll by 50%
description: Officials are blaming "late or missed reporting" and overwhelmed health workers for the hike, but under mounting pressure from Washington, Beijing insists there was no cover-up.
content: The number of people who were infected and died from the new coronavirus in China's central city of Wuhan, where the world's first infections were reported, has been revised upwards significantly. CBS News correspondent Ramy Inocencio reports that China admit… [+1338 chars]
